text:
主题:友谊的力量 起因:朋友之间吵架了 经过:怎么解决矛盾? (分享食物、互相保护、 主动道歉、互送礼物) 结果:两人和好了。 道理:珍惜友谊，与朋友 要友好相处。
习作提示:
主题:乐于助人 起因:遇到了一个需要帮 助的人，主动去帮助。 经过:怎么帮助他人的? (照顾他、救他) 结果:对方表示感谢，带 来惊喜。 道理:用善良和爱心对待 他人，最终也会收获温暖 和幸福。
1、题目居中，每段开头空两格。 2、至少分为三段，字数不少于300字。 3、运用好词好句、修辞手法。 4、合理想象，语句通顺。
trans:
Theme: The Power of Friendship Cause: A quarrel between friends Process: How to solve the conflict?. (sharing food, protecting each other, apologizing, giving each other gifts) Result: they made up. Lesson: Cherish friendship and be friendly with your friends.
Writing Prompt:
Theme: Helping others Cause: When you meet someone who needs help, you take the initiative to help him. Process: How do you help others? (Take care of him, save him) Result: The other party expresses gratitude and brings surprise. Moral: Treat others with kindness and love, and you will eventually gain warmth and happiness.
1. Center the title and leave two spaces at the beginning of each paragraph. 2. Divide into at least three paragraphs, with a minimum of 300 words. 3. Use good words, sentences and rhetoric. 4. Use reasonable imagination and coherent sentences.
